00061 /* translation */
00062 int BLF_translate_iface(void);
00063 int BLF_translate_tooltips(void);

00065 const char *BLF_translate_do_tooltip(const char *contex, const char *msgid);

00067 
00068 /* The "translation-marker" macro. */
00069 #define N_(msgid) msgid
00070 #define CTX_N_(context, msgid) msgid
00071 /* Those macros should be used everywhere in UI code. */
00072 #ifdef WITH_INTERNATIONAL
00073 /*  #define _(msgid) BLF_gettext(msgid) */
00074     #define IFACE_(msgid) BLF_translate_do_iface(NULL, msgid)
00075     #define TIP_(msgid) BLF_translate_do_tooltip(NULL, msgid)
00076     #define CTX_IFACE_(context, msgid) BLF_translate_do_iface(context, msgid)
00077     #define CTX_TIP_(context, msgid) BLF_translate_do_tooltip(context, msgid)
00078 #else
00079 /*  #define _(msgid) msgid */
00080     #define IFACE_(msgid) msgid
00081     #define TIP_(msgid) msgid
00082     #define CTX_IFACE_(context, msgid) msgid
00083     #define CTX_TIP_(context, msgid) msgid
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 /******************************************************************************
00087  * All i18n contexts must be defined here.
00088  * This is a nice way to be sure not to use a context twice for different
00089  * things, and limit the number of existing contexts!
00090  */
00091 
00092 /* Default, void context. Just in case... */
00093 #define BLF_I18NCONTEXT_DEFAULT ""
00094 
00095 /* Default context for operator names/labels. */
00096 #define BLF_I18NCONTEXT_OPERATOR_DEFAULT "Operator"
